note.p: Commission agent and publisher. Of Hayle, Cornwall. Printer and stationer, 1851; commission agent, 1861; printer and stationer, 1871; annuitant, 1881. Edited the Cornwall and Devon mining directory, 1861, 1870.
Census returns of England and Wales 1851 (The National Archives: Public Record Office HO107/1916/623/44), 1861 (RG9/1586/68/36), 1871 (RG10/2327/45/7), 1881 (RG11/2337/46/18)
